Mind Your Way is a game where you visit checkpoints around the map.
From the main city view different region can be seen, separated by outlines. Tap on a region to select it. At the start only the Center region is unlocked, but as you progress you will unlock more!
Once you press "Go to this region", you will see the checkpoints represented by [circles]. Select one that is enabled, but not reached yet, and press "Go to location". This will open a Google Maps screen where you can see [your position] and [your destination]. When you reach your destination, press [check button] to proceed to the next stage.
Now you can play a minigame! After finishing it, the checkpoint will be marked as complete.
Complete more checkpoints to earn experience and level up!
